post:
<a href="https://www.racknerd.com/NewYear"><img src="https://blog.racknerd.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/racknerd-2021.jpg" width="85%" height="70%" /></a>

2021 New Year Sale by RackNerd! Come join the fun! :smiley: Our deals are all new to celebrate 2021, and they’re HOT! We are committed to the key points we mentioned in our [guest post featured on LowEndBox](https://lowendbox.com/blog/guest-post-5-tips-to-succeed-in-the-hosting-industry-in-the-new-economy-by-dustin-cisneros-ceo-of-racknerd "guest post featured on LowEndBox"). We are expanding at a very rapid pace (rather than contracting), we’ve added additional staffing to be able to continue to service and provide every customer with the attention and prompt support they deserve, we are implementing new ideas, and we’re increasing our standard features and value delivery to our customers. We’ve added more available VPS datacenter locations such as Amsterdam, and we’ve just added hybrid **MailChannels premium email delivery** on our shared/reseller hosting plans, now included. There has never been a better time to join, or expand your services with RackNerd.

#Additionally, we are ringing in the new year by doing surprise giveaways randomly throughout this thread. Be sure to stay active to increase your chances of winning a giveaway.

We are including some of our most popular New Year packages below. As to not clutter this thread we will not be listing every plan below. Please <a href= https://www.racknerd.com/NewYear/>click here</a> to view all specials we have to offer on Linux VPS, Windows VPS, Shared Hosting and Reseller Hosting during this sale. 

<hr>
<a href="https://www.racknerd.com/NewYear"><img src="https://blog.racknerd.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/kvm-vps-2021.jpg"></a>
Deploy your new KVM VPS in Los Angeles, San Jose, Dallas, Chicago, Seattle, or Amsterdam. Any location not available in the order form at the time of ordering simply means we’ve sold out in that location for now. We are working hard to replenish inventory to meet the high demand we are seeing.

**All VPS plans are instantly set up!** CentOS, Fedora, Debian and Ubuntu Supported. Custom Linux ISO's can also be mounted via support ticket.

**DOUBLE THE BANDWIDTH ON ANY OF OUR NEW YEAR DEALS - valid for any new order you place now through Jan/7/2020. Just comment your order# within this thread and we will double your bandwidth.**

**Stay active, and frequently check in on this thread. We will be doing random giveaways - Simply FREE w/ no purchase necessary :) We will for example say "The next 5 comments receive a FREE VPS". The resources of the giveaway will be random and announced within this thread. We also may give away physical, cool items relevant to technology. So stay engaged within this thread :) And you will just increase your chances of winning, Or if you’re lucky, you might just win multiple times!**
